key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities including raw material shortages and rising input costs
Economic sensitivity due to reliance on construction and industrial sectors
Regulatory compliance risks, particularly environmental and safety regulations
controversies: $54,625 penalty with the California Air Resources Board (CARB) for emissions violations
Insider selling by Director Robert M. Swartz in January 2024
environmental_issues: Emissions violations leading to regulatory penalties
Reliance on chemical-based products with potential environmental impact
social_issues: Commitment to workplace safety and employee development
Reduction in Total Recordable Incident Rate from 3.2 in 2020 to 0.9 by December 2023
governance_issues: Insider selling raising concerns about insider confidence
Strong governance demonstrated by share buyback program and strategic acquisitions
